src=\"http://www.brighton.com/store_image/site/js_tc_header_banner_20170422b.js\"></script></div>        </div>\n                <div id=\"header_banner6\" class=\"\">\n        \t<div class=\"caption\"><script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"http://www.brighton.com/Scripts/typeahead/typeahead.bundle.min.js\"></script>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\"> \n\nvar suggestedProducts = new Bloodhound({\n\tdatumTokenizer: Bloodhound.tokenizers.obj.whitespace,\n\tqueryTokenizer: Bloodhound.tokenizers.whitespace,\n\tremote: {\n\t\turl             : 'http://brm-suggest-0.brsrvr.com/api/v1/suggest/?account_id=5334&auth_key=&domain_key=brighton_com&request_id='+Math.floor(Math.random()*1E12)+'&url=www.brighton.com&q=%QUERY&request_type=suggest',\n\t\twildcard        : '%QUERY',\n\t\ttransform: function(result) {\n\t\t\toutput = [];\n                        if(typeof(result.spellcheck.suggestions[1]) != 'undefined'){\n\t\t\t    $j.each(result.spellcheck.suggestions[1].suggestion, function( index, value ) {\n\t\t\t    \t    output.push(value.replace('dq=', ''));\n\t\t\t    });\n                        }\n            return output;\n        }\n  }\n});\n\n$j('#searchsite_keyword').typeahead({minLength : 1, hint : true, highlight: true }, { name: 'suggested-products',  source: suggestedProducts});\n\n</script>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n$j(\"#searchsite_keyword\").keyup(function(e){\n    if((e.keyCode < 37 || e.keyCode > 40) && e.keyCode != 13){\n        tQuery = $j(\"#searchsite_keyword\").val();\n    }\n});\n\n$j('.twitter-typeahead').bind('typeahead:select', function(ev, suggestion) {\n                      var searchData = {};\n                    searchData[\"aq\"] = tQuery;\n                    searchData[\"q\"] = $j('#searchsite_keyword').val();\n                  BrTrk.getTracker().logEvent(\n                    \"suggest\", \n                    \"click\", \n                    searchData, \n                    {}, \n                    true\n                    ); \n                \n});\n\n$j('.twitter-typeahead').bind(\"typeahead:selected\", function () {\n        $j(\"#searchForm0\").submit();\n});\n\n\n\nfunction brSearch(){\n        var searchData = {};\n        searchData[\"q\"] = $j('#searchsite_keyword').val();\n        BrTrk.getTracker().logEvent(\n            \"suggest\",\n            \"submit\",\n            searchData,\n            {},\n            false\n    );\n}\n</script></div>        </div>\n        </div>\n\t<div class=\"tab_area\">\n\t<div id=\"adminmenu\" style=\"display:none\"></div>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n$j(document).ready(function () {\n   $j('.field_category_image_product_id').onFocus = null;\n             \n   if( $j('.field_category_image_product_id').val()==0) $j('.field_category_image_product_id').val('');\n   $j('.field_category_image_product_id').watermark('Product Id or SKU');\n\n});\n\nif (document.cookie.indexOf('GuestStateAdmin=') != -1) {\n\t$j(document.body).css({\n\t\t'margin-top': '22px'\n\t});\n\t$j('#adminmenu').append('<div id=\"meua\"><p><img class=\"spinner\" src=\"http://www.brighton.com/Public/Images/spinner.gif\">Loading admin menu...</p></div>')\n\t$j('#adminmenu').show();\n\t$j.ajax({\n\t\turl: ajaxFormatUrl('_adminmenu'),\n\t\tdataType: 'text',\n\t\tcache: false,\n\t\tcomplete: function(jqxhr) {\n\t\t\tif (jqxhr && jqxhr.status == 200) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j('#adminmenu').css({top:'-1000px'}).html(jqxhr.responseText).css({top:'0'});\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j('#adminmenu').css({position:'fixed',top:'0'});\n\t\t\t\t$j(document).trigger('AdminMenu.ready');\n\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\t$j('#adminmenu').hide();\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t});\n}\n\nvar customerrefhovering=false;\n$j(document).ready(function () {\n   if($j('[name=order_customerid_external]').length!=0) {\n       $j('[name=order_customerid_external]').after('<div id=\"customerrefchooser\" style=\"display: none; position: absolute; left: 750px; margin-top: -150px;  background: #eee; float:right; height: 180px; width: 500px; overflow: auto;\" class=\"ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><img src=\"/Public/Images/spinner.gif\"></img> </div>')\n       $j('[name=order_customerid_external]').focus(function(){\n                if(!customerrefhovering) $j('#customerrefchooser').fadeIn().load(ajaxFormatUrl('_ordercustomercandidates'),{order_id: ''});\n\n       }).blur(function(){     \n               if(!customerrefhovering) $j('#customerrefchooser').fadeOut();\n       });        \n\n       $j('#customerrefchooser').hover(function(){ customerrefhovering=true; }, function() { customerrefhovering=false; }).click(function(){\n            $j('input[name=order_customerid_external]').focus();\n       });\n   }\n});\n\n</script>\n<!-- CURRENT DB tc_brighton --><script language=\"javascript\">\nQuickCart_checkQuckCart();\n</script><div id=\"cart_request_loading\" style=\"display: none; z-index: 400000100;\"></div>\n<div id=\"sub\">\n\n\n\n<div id=\"stage\">\n<div class=\"fcol1\"></div><div class=\"fcol2\">\n<div class=\"frontpage-feature NoName\">\n\n<div class=\"content clearfix\"><div class=\"name\">2017 0421 Mothersday + Gift Set </div>\n<style>\n\t@import url(//maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.3.0/css/font-awesome.min.css);@import 20px;\n  }\n}\n\n\n\n\n/*========================================================\n                      Owl Carousel\n=========================================================*/\n.owl-carousel 0;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-animated-out {\n  z-index: 1;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .fadeOut {\n  -webkit-animation-name: fadeOut;\n  animation-name: fadeOut;\n}\n\n@-webkit-keyframes fadeOut {\n  0% {\n    opacity: 1;\n  }\n\n  100% {\n    opacity: 0;\n  }\n}\n@keyframes fadeOut {\n  0% {\n    opacity: 1;\n  }\n\n  100% {\n    opacity: 0;\n  }\n}\n.owl-height {\n  -moz-transition: height 500ms ease-in-out;\n  -o-transition: height 500ms ease-in-out;\n  -webkit-transition: height 500ms ease-in-out;\n  transition: height 500ms ease-in-out;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel {\n  display: none;\n  width: 100%;\n  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 1;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-stage {\n  position: relative;\n  -ms-touch-action: pan-Y;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-stage:after {\n  content: \".\";\n  display: block;\n  clear: both;\n  visibility: hidden;\n  line-height: 0;\n  height: 0;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-stage-outer {\n  position: relative;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px);\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-controls .owl-nav .owl-prev,\n.owl-carousel .owl-controls .owl-nav .owl-next,\n.owl-carousel .owl-controls .owl-dot {\n  cursor: pointer;\n  cursor: hand;\n  -webkit-user-select: none;\n  -khtml-user-select: none;\n  -moz-user-select: none;\n  -ms-user-select: none;\n  user-select: none;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel.owl-loaded {\n  display: block;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel.owl-loading {\n  opacity: 0;\n  display: block;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel.owl-hidden {\n  opacity: 0;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-refresh .owl-item {\n  display: none;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-item {\n  position: relative;\n  min-height: 1px;\n  float: left;\n  -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;\n  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;\n  -webkit-touch-callout: none;\n  -webkit-user-select: none;\n  -khtml-user-select: none;\n  -moz-user-select: none;\n  -ms-user-select: none;\n  user-select: none;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel.owl-text-select-on .owl-item {\n  -webkit-user-select: none;\n  -khtml-user-select: none;\n  -moz-user-select: none;\n  -ms-user-select: none;\n  user-select: none;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-grab {\n  cursor: move;\n  cursor: -webkit-grab;\n  cursor: -o-grab;\n  cursor: -ms-grab;\n  cursor: grab;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel.owl-rtl {\n  direction: rtl;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel.owl-rtl .owl-item {\n  float: right;\n}\n\n.no-js .owl-carousel {\n  display: block;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-item .owl-lazy {\n  opacity: 0;\n  -moz-transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n  -o-transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n  -webkit-transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n  transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-item img {\n  transform-style: preserve-3d;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-video-wrapper {\n  position: relative;\n  height: 100%;\n  background: #000;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-video-tn {\n  opacity: 0;\n  height: 100%;\n  background-position: center center;\n  background-repeat: no-repeat;\n  -webkit-background-size: contain;\n  -moz-background-size: contain;\n  -o-background-size: contain;\n  background-size: contain;\n  -moz-transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n  -o-transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n  -webkit-transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n  transition: opacity 400ms ease;\n}\n\n.owl-carousel .owl-video-frame {\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 1;\n}\n\n.owl-dots {\n  margin-top: 42px;\n  text-align: center;\n  line-height: 16px;\n}\n.owl-dots .owl-dot {\n  display: inline-block;\n  width: 12px;\n  height: 12px;\n  border: 2px solid #E5E5E5;\n  border-radius: 50%;\n  -moz-border-radius: 50%;\n  -webkit-border-radius: 50%;\n  -moz-transition: 0.3s all ease;\n  -o-transition: 0.3s all ease;\n  -webkit-transition: 0.3s all ease;\n  transition: 0.3s all ease;\n}\n.owl-dots .owl-dot:hover, .owl-dots .owl-dot.active {\n  background: #E5E5E5;\n}\n.owl-dots .owl-dot + .owl-dot {\n  margin-left: 9px;\n}\n</style>\n\n\n\n</div></div></div></div></div>\n\n<div class=\"page\">\n  <!--========================================================\n                            HEADER\n ? parseInt(myNav.split('msie')[1]) : false;\n};\n\nvar videReady = function() {\n\tif ($j('.mm-page').length) {\n\t\tconsole.log('PAGE ready')\n\t\t//\n\t\t//\n\t\t\n\t\t\tvar o = $j('.lazy-img img');\n\t\t\tif (o.length > 0) {\n\t\t\t\tIncludeJavaScript(\"//www.brighton.com/store_image/site/js/jquery.unveil.js\",function() {\n\t\t\t\t\tvar o = $j('.lazy-img img');\n\t\t\t\t\t//$j(document).ready(function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(o).unveil(0, function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (isIE() && isIE() < 9) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(this).load().addClass(\"lazy-loaded\");\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(this).load(function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(this).addClass(\"lazy-loaded\");\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t})\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t\t\t//});\n\t\t\t\t\t//\n\t\t\t\t\t//$j(window).load(function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(window).trigger('lookup.unveil');\n\t\t\t\t\t//});\n\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\n\t\t//\n\t\t//\n\t\tvar o = $j('.vide');\n\t\tif (o.length > 0) {\n\t\t\tIncludeJavaScript(\"//www.brighton.com/store_image/site/js/jquery.vide.js\",function() {\n\t\t\t});\n\t\t}\n\t\t//\n\t\t//\n\t\t\n\t\t//\n\t\t//\n\t\tIncludeJavaScript(\"//www.brighton.com/store_image/site/js/device.min.js\",function() {\n\t\t\t//\n\t\t\t//\n\t\t\tvar o = $j('html');\n\t\t\tif (o.hasClass('desktop')) {\n\t\t\t\tIncludeJavaScript(\"//www.brighton.com/store_image/site/js/jquery.ui.totop.js\",function() {\n\t\t\t\t\t$j().UItoTop({easingType: 'easeOutQuart'});\n\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t//\n\t\t\t//\n\t\t\t(function ($j) {\n\t\t\t\tvar o = $j('.parallax');\n\t\t\t\tif (o.length > 0 && $j('html').hasClass('desktop')) {\n\t\t\t\t\t//IncludeJavaScript(\"//www.brighton.com/store_image/site/js/jquery.rd-parallax.js\",function() {\n\t\t\t\t\t//});\n\t\t\t\t\t(function ($) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tvar $window = $j(window);\n\t\t\t\t\t\tvar windowHeight = $window.height();\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$window.resize(function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\twindowHeight = $window.height();\n\t\t\t\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$.fn.parallax = function (xpos, speed, offset, outerHeight) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar $this = $j(this);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar getHeight;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar speedFactor = speed;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar offset = offset ? parseInt(offset) : null;\n\n\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (outerHeight) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tgetHeight = function (jqo) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\treturn jqo.outerHeight(true);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t};\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tgetHeight = function (jqo) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\treturn jqo.height();\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t};\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (arguments.length < 1 || xpos === null) xpos = \"50%\";\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (arguments.length < 2 || speedFactor === null) speedFactor = -0.2;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (arguments.length < 3 || offset === null) offset = 0;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (arguments.length < 4 || outerHeight === null) outerHeight = true;\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tfunction update() {\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar pos = $window.scrollTop();\n\n\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$this.each(function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar $element = $j(this);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar top = $element.offset().top;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar height = getHeight($element);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif (top + height < pos || top > pos + windowHeight) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\treturn;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$element.css('backgroundPosition', xpos + \" \" + (Math.round((top - pos) * speedFactor) + offset) + \"px\");\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$window.bind('scroll', update).resize(update);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tupdate();\n\t\t\t\t\t\t};\n\t\t\t\t\t})(jQuery);\n\n\t\t\t\t\t//$j(document).ready(function () {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tvar obj;\n\t\t\t\t\t\tif ((obj = $j('.parallax')).length > 0 && $j('html').hasClass('desktop')) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tfor (var i = 0; i < obj.length; i++) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tif(isIE() && isIE() < 9){\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(obj[i]).parallax($j(obj[i]).css('backgroundPositionX'), obj[i].getAttribute('data-parallax-speed'), obj[i].getAttribute('data-parallax-offset'));\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}else{\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$j(obj[i]).parallax($j(obj[i]).css('background-position').split(\" \")[0], obj[i].getAttribute('data-parallax-speed'), obj[i].getAttribute('data-parallax-offset'));\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\tfunction isIE() {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvar myNav = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\treturn (myNav.indexOf('msie') != -1) ? parseInt(myNav.split('msie')[1]) : false;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t};\n\t\t\t\t\t//});\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t})(jQuery);\n\t\t});\n\t\t//\n\t\t//\n\t\tclearInterval(videWait);\n\t} else {\n\t\tconsole.log('PAGE not ready')\n\t}\n};\n\nvar videWait = setInterval(function(){ videReady() }, 250);\n</script>\n\n</div>\n</div>\n</div><div class=\"fcol3\"></div><div class=\"fcol4\">\n<div class=\"frontpage-feature CertonaRecs NoName\">\n\n<div
